name: Cannabis Business
description: Comprehensive assessment of cannabis-related business involvement including legal status, direct/indirect connections, and income thresholds

Q1.text: Is the client involved in a cannabis-related business through their business activity?

Q2.text: Is the cannabis-related activity illegal in the country of operation, or does it include trade or custody of digital assets via a non-permissible exchange?

Q3.text: Does the client activity solely involve hemp business, trade/custody of cannabis securities on a permissible exchange, or face objections from compliance/reputational risk teams?

Q4.text: Does the client activity involve direct cannabis operations (growing, cultivating, testing, producing, distributing, or transporting cannabis)?

Q5.text: Does the client hold an executive management or board of directors position in the cannabis business?

Q6.text: Does the income from the cannabis-related activity represent more than 10% of the client's total income?

Q7.text: Does the client activity involve indirect cannabis connections (providing specialist equipment for growing, leasing land/property for cannabis operations, or investing in cannabis businesses)?

Q8.text: Does the income from the cannabis-related activity represent more than 25% of the client's total income?
